ai-tha-ap59:1.3_0: Having faith in the true teaching,
ai-tha-ap59:2.1_0: I gave the Island to the lamp
ai-tha-ap59:3.4_0: as I was the fruit of giving a gift.
ai-tha-ap59:4.2_0: even the mountains of a mountain
ai-tha-ap59:5.1_0: Through the remainder of that deed,
ai-tha-ap59:5.2_0: they’ve attained the ending of defilements.
ai-tha-ap59:5.4_0: Transmigrating the teaching of the Dhamma,
ai-tha-ap59:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Jotipāla.
ai-tha-ap59:9.1_0: and five Elder Nuns were the seventh,
